name: Spherry
description:
Spherry is a Compo game made for Ludum Dare 49.

Rescue the kitties!

How to play:
  • Tilt the ferry to keep the animals on the board.
  • Losing animals results in score penalty.
  • After completing a stage you can choose to keep playing or stop and save the score.
  • Every next stage is longer than the previous one.
  • Have fun!
Default controls:
  • A/Left Arrow - Tilt left
  • D/Right Arrow - Tilt right
Have fun!
